tit.cmt: 余分なピリオドを削除

sen.j: 松原水泳場（まつばらすいえいじょう）は、滋賀県彦根市にある水泳場。
sen.e: Matsubara. Swimming Area is located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.
Matsubara Swimming Area is located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 余分なピリオドを削除
sen.e: Matsubara Swimming Area is located in Hikone City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 海であれば「海岸」・「海水浴場」であるが、琵琶湖であるので「水泳場」。
sen.e: If it was located in the ocean it should have been called 'seaside' or 'swimming beach,' but it is called 'swimming area' because it is in Lake Biwa.
If it was located in the seaside area it should have been called 'seaside' or 'swimming beach,' but it is called 'swimming area' because it is in Lake Biwa.
If it was located in the seaside area it should have been called 'seaside' or 'swimming beach,' but it is called 'swimming area' because it is in Lake Biwa.

sen.j: 同水泳場では、1980年より毎年7月末に鳥人間コンテスト選手権大会（読売テレビで放映。オンエアは毎年たいてい8月末）が行われている。
sen.e: Japan International Birdman Rally (aired by Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation every year, usually at the end of August.) has been held at the swimming beach every tear, since 1980.
Japan International Birdman Rally (aired by Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation every year, usually at the end of August.) has been held at the swimming beach every year in the end of July, since 1980.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れin the end of Julyを補足しました。スペル修正tear → year
sen.e: Japan International Birdman Rally (aired by Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation every year, usually at the end of August.) has been held at the swimming beach every year in the end of July, since 1980.
